faqs.question: How does Pirate Mobile’s Guadeloupe eSIM work?
faqs.answer: Pirate Mobile’s Guadeloupe eSIM allows you to activate a mobile data plan digitally without needing a physical SIM card. Simply scan the provided QR code, and you’re connected.

faqs.question: Is the Guadeloupe eSIM activated before I arrive?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can activate the eSIM before arriving in Guadeloupe, so you have instant connectivity as soon as you land. You just need an internet connection to complete the setup.

faqs.question: Can I top up my data on Pirate Mobile’s Guadeloupe eSIM?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can easily top up your data through Pirate Mobile’s website if you run out during your stay in Guadeloupe.

faqs.question: How long does the Guadeloupe eSIM remain active?
faqs.answer: The duration depends on the plan you select. We offer flexible options, from short-term travel plans to longer data packages that last several weeks.
